00033 // -------
00034 // destroy
00035 // -------
00036 
00037 template <typename A, typename BI>
00038 BI destroy (A& a, BI b, BI e) {
00039         while (b != e) {
00040                 --e;
00041                 a.destroy(&*e);}
00042         return b;}
00043 
00044 // ------------------
00045 // uninitialized_copy
00046 // ------------------
00047 
00048 template <typename A, typename II, typename BI>
00049 BI uninitialized_copy (A& a, II b, II e, BI x) {
00050         BI p = x;
00051         try {
00052                 while (b != e) {
00053                         a.construct(&*x, *b);
00054                         ++b;
00055                         ++x;}}
00056         catch (...) {
00057                 destroy(a, p, x);
00058                 throw;}
00059         return x;}
00060 
00061 // ------------------
00062 // uninitialized_fill
00063 // ------------------
00064 
00065 template <typename A, typename BI, typename U>
00066 BI uninitialized_fill (A& a, BI b, BI e, const U& v) {
00067         BI p = b;
00068         try {
00069                 while (b != e) {
00070                         a.construct(&*b, v);
00071                         ++b;
00072                 }}
00073         catch (...) {
00074                 destroy(a, p, b);
00075                 throw;}
00076         return e;}
00077

00595         explicit Deque (const allocator_type& a = allocator_type()) : a(a) {
00596                 b = e = b_a = e_a = 0;
00597                 d_size = 0;
00598                 assert(valid());}
00599 
00605         explicit Deque (size_type s, const_reference v = value_type(), const allocator_type& a = allocator_type()) : a(a) {
00606                 d_size = s;
00607                 b_a = this->a.allocate( s+1 );
00608                 e_a = b_a + s + 1;
00609                 uninitialized_fill(this->a, b_a, e_a, v);
00610                 b = b_a +  ( (e_a - b_a)  / 2);
00611                 e = b-1;
00612                 //this->a.destroy(&*e); 
00613                 assert(valid());
00614         }
00615 
00621         Deque (const Deque& that) : a(that.a) {
00622                 if(that.empty()){
00623                 b = e = b_a = e_a = 0;
00624                 d_size = 0;
00625                 }
00626                 else{
00627                 d_size = that.d_size;
00628                 b_a = this->a.allocate( d_size + 1);
00629                 e_a = b_a + d_size + 1;
00630                 b = b_a +  ( (e_a - b_a)  / 2);
00631                 e = b-1;
00632                 uninitialized_copy(a, that.begin(), that.end(), begin());
00633                 }
00634                 assert(valid());
00635                 
00636                 }

00638         // ----------
00639         // destructor
00640         // ----------
00641 
00645         ~Deque () {
00646                 //destroy(this->a, b_a, e_a );
00647                 destroy(this->a, this->begin(), this->end() );
00648                 a.deallocate(b_a, (e_a - b_a) );
00649                 assert(valid());}
00650 
00651         // ----------
00652         // operator =
00653         // ----------
00654 
00660         Deque& operator = (const Deque& rhs) {
00661                 if(this == &rhs) return *this;
00662                 if(rhs.size() == size())
00663                         std::copy(rhs.begin(), rhs.end(), this->begin());
00664                 else if(rhs.size() < size()){
00665                         std::copy(rhs.begin(), rhs.end(), begin());
00666                         resize(rhs.size());
00667                         d_size = rhs.size();
00668                 }
00669                 else if(rhs.size() <= capacity()){
00670                         iterator it = this->end();
00671                         const_iterator rhs_it = rhs.begin();
00672                         rhs_it += size();
00673                         std::copy(rhs.begin(), rhs_it, begin());
00674                         it = uninitialized_copy(a, rhs_it, 
00675                                         rhs.end(), end());
00676                         e = it.p;
00677                         d_size = rhs.size();
00678                 }
00679                 else{
00680                         Deque x(rhs, rhs.capacity());
00681                         this->swap(x);
00682                 }
00683                 assert(valid());
00684                 return *this;}
00685 
00686         // -----------
00687         // operator []
00688         // -----------
00689 
00696         reference operator [] (size_type index) {
00697                 pointer b_copy = b;
00698                 size_type b2e_a = e_a - b;
00699                 if(index < b2e_a){
00700                         b_copy += index;
00701                         reference result = *b_copy;
00702                         return result;
00703                 }
00704                 else{ //index >= b2e_a
00705                         index -= b2e_a;
00706                         b_copy = b_a;
00707                         b_copy += index;
00708                         reference result = *b_copy;
00709                         return result;
00710                 }
00711         }
00712 
00719         const_reference operator [] (size_type index) const {
00720                 return const_cast<Deque*>(this)->operator[](index);}

00733         reference at (size_type index) {
00734                 if(index < 0 || index >= d_size){
00735                         throw std::out_of_range("My::Deque.at(i) invalid index");
00736                 }
00737                 pointer b_copy = b;
00738                 size_type b2e_a = e_a - b;
00739                 if(index < b2e_a){
00740                         b_copy += index;
00741                         reference result = *b_copy;
00742                         return result;
00743                 }
00744                 else{ //index >= b2e_a
00745                         index -= b2e_a;
00746                         b_copy = b_a;
00747                         b_copy += index;
00748                         reference result = *b_copy;
00749                         return result;
00750                 }
00751         }

00764         // ----

00771         reference back () {
00772                 pointer back = e;
00773                 if( b_a == back){
00774                         back = e_a - 1;
00775                         reference result = *back;
00776                         return result;
00777                 }
00778                 else{
00779                         --back;
00780                         reference result = *back;
00781                         return result;
00782                 }
00783         }
00787         const_reference back () const {
00788                 return const_cast<Deque*>(this)->back();}

00845         // -----
00846         // erase
00847         // -----
00848 
00853         iterator erase (iterator i) {
00854                 if(i == begin()){
00855                         pop_front();
00856                         return begin();
00857                 }
00858                 else if(i == end() - 1){
00859                         pop_back();
00860                         return end() -1;
00861                 }
00862                 else{
00863                 //erasing at the middle
00864                 iterator it= i;
00865                         while(it != (end() -1) ){
00866                         *it = * (it + 1);
00867                         ++it;
00868                         }
00869                 pop_back();
00870                 }
00871                 assert(valid());
00872                 return i;}
00873 
00874         // -----
00875         // front
00876         // -----
00877 
00881         reference front () {
00882                 return *b;
00883                 }
00884 
00888         const_reference front () const {
00889                 return const_cast<Deque*>(this)->front();}
00890 
00891         // ------
00892         // insert
00893         // ------
00894 
00900         iterator insert (iterator it1, const_reference v) {
00901                 iterator it = begin();
00902                 if(it1==begin()){
00903                         push_front(v);
00904                         return begin();}
00905                 else if(it1== (end() - 1) ){
00906                         push_back(v);
00907                         return (end()-1);}
00908                 else{ //inserting at the middle
00909                 // need to count the offset of it to it1
00910                 difference_type diff = 0;
00911                 while(it != it1){
00912                 ++diff; ++it;
00913                 }
00914                 push_front(v);
00915                 //new begin() because of the resizing possibility
00916                 it = begin();
00917                 it1 = it + diff;
00918                   while(it != it1){
00919                         *it = *(it + 1);
00920                         ++it;
00921                       } 
00922                 *it = v;
00923                 }
00924                 assert(valid());
00925                 return it;}
00926 
00927         // ---
00928         // pop
00929         // ---
00930 
00934         void pop_back () {
00935                 assert(!empty());
00936                 resize(d_size - 1);
00937                 assert(valid());}
00938 
00942         void pop_front () {
00943                 assert(!empty());
00944                 iterator it = begin();
00945                 if( (it+1) == end()){
00946                         clear(); return;
00947                 }
00948                 a.destroy(&*it);
00949                 ++it;
00950                 b = it.p;
00951                 d_size -= 1;
00952                 assert(valid());}
00953 
00954         // ----
00955         // push
00956         // ----
00957 
00961         void push_back (const_reference v) {
00962                 resize(size() + 1, v);
00963                 assert(valid());}
00964 
00968         void push_front (const_reference v) {
00969                 iterator it = begin();
00970                 size_type temp = d_size;
00971                 if( (it - 1) == end() ){
00972                      resize(2 * size());
00973                 }
00974                     it = begin();
00975                      --it;
00976                      *it = v;
00977                      b = it.p;
00978                      d_size = temp + 1;
00979                 assert(valid());}
00980 
00981         // --------
00982         // capacity
00983         // --------
00984 
00988 private:
00989         size_type capacity() const {
00990                 return (e_a - b_a);
00991         }
00992 
00993         /*
00994          * Private constructor for resize
00995          * acts the same like a copy constructor but with a specified size_type c
00996          */
00997 
00998         Deque (const Deque& that, size_type c) : a(that.a) {
00999                 b_a = this->a.allocate( c + 1);
01000                 e_a = b_a + c + 1;
01001                 b = b_a +  ( (e_a - b_a)  / 2);
01002                 iterator it(this, b);
01003                 const_iterator thatIt(&that, that.b);
01004                 it = uninitialized_copy(a, that.begin(), that.end(), begin());
01005                 e = it.p;
01006                 d_size = that.size();    
01007                 assert(valid());
01008         }
01009 public:
01010         // ------
01011         // resize
01012         // ------
01013 
01018         void resize (size_type s, const_reference v = value_type()) {
01019                 iterator it(this, b);
01020                 if(s == 0){
01021                         it = destroy(a, it, this->end());
01022                         b = b_a +  ( (e_a - b_a)  / 2);
01023                         e = b;
01024                         d_size = s;
01025                         return;
01026                 }
01027                 else if(size() == 0 && s < capacity() ){
01028                     size_type b2e_a = e_a - b;
01029                     if(s < (b2e_a)){
01030                         e = uninitialized_fill(a, b, b + s, v);
01031                         }
01032                     else{ // need to wrap around
01033                         size_type t = s - b2e_a;
01034                         pointer b_copy = b;
01035                         b_copy = uninitialized_fill(a, b, b + b2e_a, v);
01036                         e = uninitialized_fill(a, b_a, b_a + t, v);
01037                     }
01038                         d_size = s;  
01039                         return;
01040                 }
01041                 if (s == d_size) return;
01042                 if (s < size() ){
01043                         it += s;
01044                         it = destroy(a, it, this->end());
01045                         e = it.p;
01046                         d_size = s;
01047                 }
01048                 else if(s < capacity() ){
01049                         it.p = e;
01050                         it = uninitialized_fill(a, it , it + s, v);
01051                         e = it.p;
01052                         d_size = s;
01053                 }
01054                 else{
01055                         size_type st = s;
01056                         s = std::max(2*size(), s);
01057                         Deque temp(*this, s);
01058                         this->swap(temp);
01059                         it.p = e;
01060                         //we need to fill the rest of the spot, that we 
01061                         // haven't filled in and that spot is size of dif
01062                         size_type dif = st - d_size;
01063                         it = uninitialized_fill(a, it, it + dif, v);
01064                         e = it.p;
01065                         d_size = st;
01066                 }
01067                 assert(valid());
01068         }
01069 
01070         // ----
01071         // size
01072         // ----
01073 
01077         size_type size () const {
01078                 // <your code>
01079                 return d_size;}
01080 
01081         // ----
01082         // swap
01083         // ----
01084 
01089         void swap (Deque& that) {
01090                 if(a == that.a){
01091                         std::swap(b_a, that.b_a);
01092                         std::swap(e_a, that.e_a);
01093                         std::swap(b, that.b);
01094                         std::swap(e, that.e);
01095                         size_type temp = d_size;
01096                         d_size = that.d_size;
01097                         that.d_size = temp;
01098                 }
01099                 else{
01100                         Deque temp(*this);
01101                         *this = that;
01102                         that = temp;
01103                 }
01104                 //assert(valid());
01105              }
01106                 
01107         };// end Deque class
01108 
01109 } // My
01110 
01111 #endif // Deque_h
